channel.title: Blast Pit
channel.description: [i]i have a glitch in my PC HL i guess coz whenever i aboard the lift where there is all the green water thing around it. After pressing the button in lift i always die on reaching halfway. Does anyone have the same problem an i need a solution plzz.[/i]
